text: Exciting news from UAMS! üëè Several current and former physicians have been recognized as Healthcare Research All-Stars by Avant-garde Health for their outstanding contributions to the medical field. Among them, the Hip and Knee Surgery team has ranked in the top 1% nationwide. To be named on this list, physicians and hospitals needed to excel in both healthcare research and patient care. Congratulations to Dr. C. Lowry Barnes and all the UAMS Research All-Stars! üåü
